title: Where can one get more alarm sounds to choose from?
content: I have had a pixel for over two years and I need new alarm sounds to choose from - i have kind of exhausted the more "alarming" pre-set ones (I struggle waking up). I know I can pull from my drive, youtube, spotify, etc. however I'm looking for just a simple (rather loud) alarm to get up. I was wondering if Google had a suggestion of where one could find some new ones they would suggest.....
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
